Articles.Content: Just like in Besiege, what if we had the option to set objects on the ground as if they were being affected by gravity while still designing them? This way, we wouldn't have large, less stable crafts have parts of them hitting the ground with enough force that they are destroyed before the mission has begun.
I like this idea! It would make people think more carefully about where all their pieces are before the launch (and inevitable revert).
